statement.tex: \text{Find the domain and range of the }\\ \text{following function} \\ \qquad f(x) = \vert x - 1\vert

step.tex: f(x) = \vert x - 1\vert\text{ is defined for }\textbf{all x.}

step.context: \textbf{Right or wrong? } \text{The minimum and maximum}\\ \text{values of f(x) - and so it's range - are as follows.}
step.reason: f(x) = \vert x-1\vert = \begin{cases} -(x-1), x\lt 1 \\ (x-1), \underbrace{x\geq 1}_{\textbf{very important}} \end{cases}\\ = \begin{cases} 1-x, x\lt 1 \\ x-1, x\geq 1 \end{cases} \\ \text{So, }\vert x-1\vert \gt 0\text{ for all x.} \\ \textbf{But, }\text{its minimum value will be } = 0\text{ at x = 1.}\\ \text{Hence, the range of }f(x) = [0,\infty).
